Author: lokko
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN] GIF [ANN]GIFcoin ICO - Gambling Investment Fund[LIVE] ✅✅✅
Body: I would like to point this out again, vitalbet or buff88.com is an affiliate site almost all content comes from another provider and were integrated on the website, no big work There are 1000 of these websites  Gifcoin team gets a Provision from this provider,  from this Provison they keep 55% ! 45% pays gifcoin to tokenholders Please do not forget and dont forget Gifcoin is also paid by this 45%  So if you think you  making money with Gifshit, you're wrong  The only ones making money are Gifcoin  as an example, because more they will not include  Gifcoin takes $ 10,000,000   55% of this will be deducted   45% are = 4,500,000 - 20% for whatever    80% = 3,600,000 / 300,000,000 Tokens  = 0.012 per token  now the Gifcoin team itself has 20,000,000 tokens out of the 300,000,000  20,000,000 x 0.012 = $ 240,000  that means Gifcoin gets $ 240,000 from 3,600,000 + 20% from  4.500.000 = 900.000  240,000 out of 3,600,000 = 6.66% + 900.000 from 4.500.000 = 20% 20% + 6.66% for Gifcoin Team  45% - 26.66% =  18,34 % for Tokenholders not 80 %     in my opinion, on average a Token Holder has 15,000 tokens  15,000 x 0.012 = 180 USD that means every Tokenholder gets 180 USD This business is pure rip-off Gifcoin will never take 700,000,000 a year not even in 5 years  the only thing you did You have secured Gifcoin's income for the next 5 years and a nice life   Gifcoin will make money, Tokenholder only peanuts  cheers !

Author: drmora
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN] GIF [ANN]GIFcoin ICO - Gambling Investment Fund[LIVE] ✅✅✅
Body: LOOOOL I refer you to my previous post :  Quote from: drmora on June 19, 2018, 08:35:06 AM I sent an email yesterday to GIFcoin team (no answer for the moment) :  Quote Hi GIFcoin,  Some investors (and me) are a little scared about your project, as you can read on Bitcointalk.org, for several reasons :  1)   Your ICO is over but there is no communication from you (results, your next roadmap step, exchange(s) listing…etc)  2)   Your ETH/BTC/LTC counters and your sold GIF tokens counter are not uploaded since several days (I think at least 10 days)  3)   We don’t still have any information about your eGold, especially a whitepaper It’s very strange because eGold ICO is already over, so I think (and I hope) that you offered a whitepaper during the ICO, no? Otherwise, on what technical/financial basis did eGold investors invest?  4)   You have made some changes in your Whitepaper, especially about unsold GIF tokens               a. In the first version that I read (V1), you wrote that all unsold GIF tokens will be burn               b. According to the peoples who read your V1.1 version, you spoke about burn only 50% of unsold GIF tokens               c. According to your current version (V1.2), there is no longer any sentence about unsold GIF tokens (!) So I implicitly understand that you don’t want burn unsold tokens. If I want to read the older Whitepaper version, where can I find them ?  I’m sorry to tell you like this but the last point (Whitepaper changes) is absolutely not normal ! Investors made ourselves researches, we invested because we are interested in your project (and especially in his reward conditions) and finally you change the most important thing  the reward for GIF holders (indirectly but if you don’t burn unsold tokens, you mathematically dilute holders shares). I understand that you hope to sell more tokens but you should have known that a part might not be sold ! Moreover I don’t understand this behavior because you reach your soft cap… or maybe you have misjudged this soft cap?  I really hope receive an answer from you.  Thank you.  Now I'm waiting an answer but I don't really hope to have one...  GIFcoin is a SCAM ? (I precise that I'm an investor, so don't speak about FUD thx)

Body: Dear drmora ,   1) We spoke to all investors and we believe it's still early for listing on exchanges (we need to create value for GIF first). Also, we are waiting for the official release of the first exchange for security tokens Tzero. 2) The uploading is done manually and it's visible now. 3) We're concentrated on eGold and its implementation in Buff88.com. The whitepaper is being rewritten to reflect some changes. 4) After a long discussion with investors, we decided to keep 50% for LCCO (last chance coin offering) and burn the other 50%. This decision was not easy, and it was taken after careful consideration of every investor opinion.   PS: At the moment, a team of professional designers is making a full-fledged brand design mock-up for Buff88. Additionally, we are negotiating for sports feed of odds to be able to add more markets. Also, we are implementing 2,000+ casino games. We're preparing many new things and surprises.   We apologize for the late reply, but we're quite busy with distributing all tokens after the ICO, as well as taking care of the bounty program, and at the same time, working on Buff88.   Kind regards, GIFcoin Team

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN] GIF [ANN]GIFcoin ICO - Gambling Investment Fund[LIVE] ✅✅✅
Body: Thanks for the article. I wondered why they have renamed the website, but now its clear. 88 is the luckiest number in China. "Number 88 symbolizes fortune and good luck in Chinese culture, since the word 8 sounds similar to the word fā (发, which implies 发财, or wealth, in Mandarin or Cantonese). The number 8 is considered to be the luckiest number in Chinese culture, and prices in Chinese supermarkets often contain many 8s. The shape of the Chinese character for 8 (八) implies that a person will have a great, wide future as the character starts narrow and gets wider toward the bottom. The Chinese government has been auctioning auto license plates containing many 8s for tens of thousands of dollars. "

Author: Artemsv
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN] GIF [ANN]GIFcoin ICO - Gambling Investment Fund[LIVE] ✅✅✅
Body: ICO Review: Gambling Investment Fund Coin (GIFCoin)  In a novel and welcome twist to the average ICO, the online betting portal VitalBet is launching the GIFCoin token. “GIF” stands for Gambling Investment Fund and the token is a fund-raising exercise for a profitable going concern.  Operating in the lucrative online gaming arena, VitalBet already has a share of the annual $533 billion global gaming industry.  The company’s origins stem from the creation of a small team circa 2011, which was initially centered around affiliate marketing. After many associations, the company’s research pointed to the profitability of the betting and gambling arena. From that focus on producing bookmaker and gaming website catalogs in their home country of Bulgaria, six months later VitalBet penetrated the UK gaming market by producing betting affiliate catalogs. By 2015, a number of countries had been added to VitalBet’s client portfolio.  From a peripheral service provider’s point of observation, the company realized that it needed to develop a standalone betting site as “being [the] owner of a bookie was something very proﬁtable and powerful.” The company concluded its research at the end of 2014, enlisting site builders and opting for an ICO model in late 2017 to further expansion.  At the outset of 2017, VitalBet also decided to accommodate the upswing in cryptocurrencies and added bitcoin as a transactional currency to the site. Players are now able to both transact with bitcoin on the portal and also place bets with the virtual coin. From there, it was a short step to employing the ERC-20 protocol of the Ethereum platform in order to pitch the GIFCoin ICO.  VitalBet’s primary focus in the ICO is an aggressive advertising and marketing campaign through which it hopes to grow its user base substantially. The company has ambitious plans to enter the ranks of the top 15 bookmakers worldwide, each of which collects around $750 million per annum.  https://btcmanager.com/ico-review-gambling-investment-fund-coin-gifcoin/

Title: ✅✅✅[ANN] GIF [ANN]GIFcoin ICO - Gambling Investment Fund[LIVE] ✅✅✅

Pump/dump depends of the development of the project and buy/sell on stock exchange. If project growing coins will be more expensive and you don't want to sell them after the payouts. If you sell all coins after the payouts you risk after a year to buy it 10/20/300 times more expensive. Profit share coins they are usually to keep them.

Author: IvolveR
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN] GIF [ANN]GIFcoin ICO - Gambling Investment Fund[LIVE] ✅✅✅

Another example: when selling a working business/website that brings revenue, you sell it for multiple times the income it provides. So if they keep on increasing the profits of the company by expanding the project the token should go up and up. Of course if the grow predictions are accurate but the whitepaper looks very promising for me

Author: gifcoin.io
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN] GIF [ANN]GIFcoin ICO - Gambling Investment Fund[LIVE] ✅✅✅
Body: Hello,   It has been a while since we haven’t updated you, so we decided to put a long post because many things happened.  Firstly and most importantly, we have a date for the Pre-Sale – that’s February 22nd 2018. If you haven’t signed up for our whitelist, please do so on our website – https://gifcoin.io/.  The Pre-Sale will run from February 22nd, 8 AM UTC+0 until March 15th, 11:59 PM, UTC+0. During the Pre-Sale, there’ll be a 15% bonus. This means that if you buy 10,000 GIF tokens for 1 ETH, you will receive 11,500 GIF.  The ICO will run from March 16th, 8 AM UTC+0 until April 16th, 11:59 PM, UTC+0. Our soft cap is 5,000 ETH and our hard cap is 24,000 ETH. The minimum contribution size is 0.01 ETH. The investor supply is 240,000,000 GIF.  Secondly, our helpful translators have helped us translate the website into 15+ languages. These include white papers and ANN threads. We are still in the process of uploading everything to the website.  Thirdly, we have been featured on several of the most influential ICO catalogs (AS SEEN ON section on our website). We are waiting for an approval of several more. We appreciate the support.  Finally, we’d like to thank you for all the support so far, and expect more good news soon.  GIFcoin Team

Author: gifcoin.io
Title: ✅✅✅[ANN] GIF [ANN]GIFcoin ICO - Gambling Investment Fund[LIVE] ✅✅✅
Body: Thank you for the question. Immediately after the ICO comes to an end, we will create a new company, which will guarantee that GIFcoin token holders are full-fledged associates and owners of VitalBet, as well as ensure their shares. The report for new clients and revenue will be public and it will be posted on the dashboard of GIFcoin.io website, which will be unlocked for registration soon. The report will be updated at the end of each month. The dividends will be paid at the end of each calendar year. The first profit share will occur at the end of December 2018.
